text: Sandro Luiz da Silva or simply Sandro (born 13 March 1983 in Paranaguá – Paraná) is a Brazilian footballer currently playing for Real SC. == References == ==External links== * *Sandro at ZeroZero Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:S.C.
